alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Hopewell; City of Newport News; City of Petersburg; City of Williamsburg; Gloucester; Henrico; Isle of Wight; James City; King and Queen; New Kent; Prince George; Surry; Sussex; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:55PM EDT until September 25 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The City of Hopewell in south central Virginia... The southeastern City of Petersburg in south central Virginia... Northwestern Isle of Wight County in southeastern Virginia... Northwestern York County in southeastern Virginia... The northern City of Newport News in southeastern Virginia... Northeastern Sussex County in southeastern Virginia... James City County in southeastern Virginia... East central Chesterfield County in central Virginia... Southwestern Gloucester County in eastern Virginia... Southeastern King and Queen County in east central Virginia... Charles City County in east central Virginia... Prince George County in south central Virginia... Southeastern New Kent County in east central Virginia... Southeastern Henrico County in central Virginia... Surry County in southeastern Virginia... The City of Williamsburg in southeastern Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 455 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hopewell to Prince George to near Carson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Jordans Point around 500 PM EDT. Disputanta and Garysville around 505 PM EDT. Charles City, Burrowsville, Cabin Point, Ruthville and Adkins Store around 510 PM EDT. Waverly around 515 PM EDT. Claremont, Rustic and Holdcroft around 520 PM EDT. Surry, Toano and Dendron around 525 PM EDT. Norge, Scotland, Elberon and Jamestown around 530 PM EDT. Williamsburg, Queens Lake, College Of William And Mary, York Terrace, Carver Gardens and Kings Point around 535 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Pons, Croaker, Chippokes State Park, Wayside, Camp Peary, Ewell, Meadowville, Poolesville, Allmondsville and Gwaltney Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Hopewell; City of Newport News; City of Petersburg; City of Williamsburg; Gloucester; Henrico; Isle of Wight; James City; King and Queen; New Kent; Prince George; Surry; Sussex; York
